sourcesContent:
Either your email or password was incorrect. Please try again.
Forgot password?
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from '../users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login-component', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { email!: string; password!: string; public loginFail = false; constructor(private _router: Router, private _userService: UserService) { } onSubmit() { //Check if email and password exsist in our table this._userService.checkLogin(this.email.toLowerCase(), this.password).subscribe((loggedIn) => { if (!loggedIn) { //Show error message if user can't log in this.loginFail = true; } else { //If user log in, a new session is created this.loginFail = false; sessionStorage.setItem("email", this.email); this._router.navigate(['/nav-menu']).then(() => { window.location.reload() }); } }); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
